trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_SEQ_00<tab>Lothaire, a guard at Galvanth's Spire, wants you to visit the Hedgetree.

TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_SEQ_01<tab>Lothaire has asked that you remind Hearer Leonnie that she has booked passage on a vessel at the Mirror Planks. Head to the Hedgetree to the southwest and speak with the conjurer.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_SEQ_02<tab>Hearer Leonnie must remain at the Hedgetree to commune with the elementals. Inform Armelle at the Mirror Planks of the delay to the conjurer's plans.

TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_SEQ_03<tab>You convey Hearer Leonnie's message to Armelle, who resigns herself to booking the conjurer passage on a later vessel. The only issue remaining is to decide <var 1A 02 /var>how much<var 1A 01 /var> later...
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Armelle at the Mirror Planks.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_SYSTEM_100_000<tab>To accept this quest, you must abandon the current main scenario quest. Open the corresponding entry in the journal or duty list and select “Abandon.”
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LOTHAIRE_000_1<tab>I have another task for you, adventurer. I need you to head to the Hedgetree to the southwest of here and speak with Hearer Leonnie.

TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LOTHAIRE_000_2<tab>After tending to the Hedgetree, the Hearer was scheduled to board a boat from the Mirror Planks... Well, the vessel's departure time has come and gone, but there is still no sign of her.

TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LOTHAIRE_000_3<tab>Knowing how absorbed the Hearer becomes in her work, I am not unduly concerned. Armelle, however, was responsible for organizing Leonnie's transportation and is likely wondering if her wayward passenger is ever going to arrive. Perhaps a gentle reminder is in order?
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LEONNIE_000_11<tab>Yes, what troubles you, my de─? Ah. Yes. The boat. I had quite forgotten.

TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LEONNIE_000_12<tab>Hm? Oh, my task with the Hedgetree is well and finished, but the elementals murmur of a malevolent presence in the vicinity of the Tam<var 1F /var>Tara Deepcroft.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LEONNIE_000_13<tab>I must abide a while longer, that I might better divine the source of the elementals' distress. Please inform Armelle that I shall be late in arriving.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_ARMELLE_000_31<tab>You bear a message from Hearer Leonnie? An evil presence in the Deepcroft? That does sound grave, indeed.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_ARMELLE_000_32<tab>I shall organize a vessel for a later time, then. Perhaps a bell from now? Two? Better make it three, just to be safe. Thank you for your trouble.
TEXT_SUBFST068_00384_LEONNIE_000_21<tab>I must linger here a while longer. Please head to the Mirror Planks and convey my apologies to Armelle.
